page.title: 01General description of area
page.content: The area we are covering is on the South Yorkshire / Derbyshire border, east of the Pennines. The area is situated on{sandstone}with measures of {coal}and pockets of{clay}beneath it. In the west of the area the land is high, dipping down to the{Rother {Valley}in the east. The high land mostly consists of{farms.}The rest is mainly{residential}with some{industry} in the east. The older settlements are{ {Hackenthorpe, Beighton, Mosborough and {Ridgeway.}There are modern estates at{ {Westfield, Waterthorpe and Halfway.} The area has good sports facilities and outdoor activities at{Rother {Valley Country Park and Westfield {Sports Centre. }
